title: Programmer

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> Hacking someone will scramble all feedback they get, giving them random incorrect results. You will be told their real results, and what the results were scrambled into.
> If your target received no feedback, instead perform an investigator check on them (see post 35).
Win Con:
> Kill all who would oppose the town.

desc:
Post 1060
*"Sometimes a bit of confusion is needed to reveal the truth."*
